data.author: Roberto Zegers R
data.message:
Merge pull request #1 from rfzeg/master

Master to main

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Feat: stop robot when a CTRL+C signal is received

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Add parameter to reverse ranges array in case it starts with rays at the left side

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Refactor: rename, reformat and rearrange code

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Add Timer Callback to set movement state, fill vel msg, publish vel msg

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Refactor laser_callback to get the distance reading to the closest object and the ray's position index

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Rename set_drive_state() -> set_drive_logic_state(), RCLCPP_INFO() -> RCLCPP_DEBUG() logs

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Rename set_velocity() -> determine_vel_msg(), rewrite debug logs

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Rename package to 'wall_follower_ros2'. Set version to 0.0.0 in package.xml

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Add logical behavoir depending upon 5 zones around the robot, set velocity command

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Add minimal rule based obstacle avoidance node (c++)

data.author: Roberto Zegers
data.message: Add initial ROS2 package files, Readme, License & Git configuration
